WorkItem.Description:
Hello.
I use PHPEscel for parcing excel file and showing as HTML.
what i found out is that there's no "colspan" in source code of HTML if cells has been merged in excel file on any sheet , excepting first.
so, if i have 2 merged cells on Sheet2 - they are divided in HTML.
please check. thank you!
WorkItem.Summary: merged cells on other sheet doesn't work

Comments.Message: Unable to replicate, can you please provide an example

sure.
on a picture attached you can see cuts of 2 sheets,
second one is made by copy/paste of 1st.
strings of text as you see on first sheet expands further (cells are merged for 5 columns)
but on second - carries over.
hello. does anyone attend to problem? thanks.

I'm also having this (or a related) issue.
I'm on PHP 5.3.2 and PHPExcel 1.7.6

In my case, the problem occurs after I use rangeToArray() and fromArray() to copy some cells into another worksheet.
If it'll help, I'm happy to send the Excel file and code that I have to Mark directly but don't want to post it in a public forum.
